welcomeText: We are sorry that you have lost an item!  Before we continue, we would like to  briefly explain the upcoming process:  After successfully registering the lost item, the fastet process is to send you the  lost item by post. Parcels are prepared for  dispatch every Tuesday. We charge a fee of 10,00 â‚¬ for this service.  Otherwise you can come to the offical lost and found date to our venue and pick up  your lost item.   This happen every two weeks on thursday in the odd calender week.   How do I pay the service-fee?  After registrating your lost item you will get  an E-Mail from us where you choose your  pick-up opportunity. After choosing you
